title: This bounty system has made not csing an actual strategy, and it is beyond fucked.
body: So what is going on is the top laner goes some ranged champion with klepto and spellthiefs and basically doesn't cs. Instead, this laner just tries to harass the lane opponent for gold. The opposing laners will start having a bounty just for csing normally since the game thinks that they are ahead. This needs to be fixed immediately.

replies.body: Isnt it calculated by gold difference? Not just CS numbers? I'm not sure tho.

No. It has fuck all to do with bounty.

You know why it works? Because it gives another sightstone in proplay. **That's why it works**. It's another fucking {{item:3092}}.
It can work tbh. Dont forget her aoto range is 625. Its really good. But shes burst so not sure
Annie winrates have gone up lately.
